argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cvrle.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | cvrle.l | |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) |
| 3 |  | cvrle.c | |- C = ( <o ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( lt ` K ) = ( lt ` K ) |
| 5 | 1, 4, 3 | #P_cvrlt | |- ( ( ( K e. Poset /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ X C Y ) -> X ( lt ` K ) Y ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 4 | #P_pltnle | |- ( ( ( K e. Poset /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ X ( lt ` K ) Y ) -> -. Y .<_ X ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( ( K e. Poset /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ X C Y ) -> -. Y .<_ X ) |
